query.statement:
MERGE INTO SAPHEE.ZCST950N AS A USING ( SELECT BSU ,COUNT(A.PJT) AS MIQ ,SUM(CASE WHEN A.TGB = '1' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) MIQ_TGB FROM ( SELECT A.MANDT ,A.PJT ,A.HNO ,A.ARA ,A.BSU ,A.TGB ,A.BGT_B ,A.BMT_B ,A.BGT_A ,A.BMT_A ,A.GNO_B ,A.GNO_A ,A.USD FROM ( SELECT A.MANDT ,A.PJT ,A.HNO ,A.BGT_B ,A.BMT_B ,A.BGT_A ,A.BMT_A ,A.GNO_B ,A.GNO_A ,A.USD ,CASE WHEN A.IKD > '' THEN B.CS157_CAB ELSE A.ARA END ARA ,CASE WHEN A.IKD > '' THEN B.CS157_CHB ELSE A.BSU END BSU ,CASE WHEN A.IKD > '' THEN B.CS157_GHB ELSE A.TGB END TGB FROM( SELECT B.CS116_PJT PJT ,B.CS116_HNO HNO ,MAX(B.MANDT) MANDT ,MAX(B.CS116_ARA) ARA ,MAX(B.CS116_BSU) BSU ,MAX(B.CS116_TGB) TGB ,MIN(VALUE(B.CS116_BGT,'')) BGT_B ,MAX(VALUE(B.CS116_BMT,'')) BMT_B ,CASE WHEN MAX(B.CS116_BCD) > '' AND MAX(SUBSTR(B.CS116_BCD,1,6)) > MAX(SUBSTR(B.CS116_BMT,1,6)) THEN HEX(DATE(INSERT(INSERT(MAX(B.CS116_BCD),5,0,'-'),8,0,'-')) - 1 MONTHS) ELSE MAX(B.CS116_BMT) END BMT_B2 ,MIN(VALUE(D.CS116_BGT,'')) BGT_A ,MAX(VALUE(D.CS116_BMT,'')) BMT_A ,MIN(VALUE(C.CS126_USD,'')) USD ,MAX(VALUE(B.CS116_GNO,'')) GNO_B ,MAX(VALUE(D.CS116_GNO,'')) GNO_A ,MIN(VALUE(E.CS157_IKD,'')) IKD
FROM SAPHEE.ZCST116 B LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZCST126 C ON C.MANDT = B.MANDT AND C.CS126_PJT = B.CS116_PJT AND C.CS126_HNO = B.CS116_HNO AND C.CS126_PST = 'A6' AND C.CS126_GND = 'D' AND C.CS126_DDT = '' AND C.CS126_ADT <= #GDATE#
LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZCST116 D ON D.MANDT = B.MANDT AND D.CS116_PJT = B.CS116_PJT AND D.CS116_HNO = B.CS116_HNO AND D.CS116_PST = 'A6' AND D.CS116_GND = 'A' AND D.CS116_BST <= #GDATE# AND D.CS116_BGT <= #GDATE#
LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZCST157 E ON E.MANDT = B.MANDT AND E.CS157_PJT = B.CS116_PJT AND E.CS157_HNO = B.CS116_HNO AND E.CS157_IKD >= #GDATE#
WHERE B.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND SUBSTR(B.CS116_HNO,1,1) IN ('L','S','W','C') AND B.CS116_PST = 'A6' AND B.CS116_GND = 'B' AND B.CS116_BST <= #GDATE#
GROUP BY B.CS116_PJT, B.CS116_HNO ) A LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZCST157 B ON B.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND B.CS157_PJT = A.PJT AND B.CS157_HNO = A.HNO AND B.CS157_IKD = A.IKD
WHERE ( SUBSTR(A.BGT_B,1,6) = SUBSTR(#GDATE#,1,6) OR ( A.BGT_B <= #GDATE# AND A.BMT_B2 >= SUBSTR(#GDATE#,1,6)||'01') ) ) A LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT CS144_PJT PJT, CS144_HNO HNO, MAX(CS143_FSD) JHD FROM SAPHEE.ZCST144 A, SAPHEE.ZCST143 B WHERE A.MANDT = B.MANDT AND A.CS144_SEQ = B.CS143_SEQ AND A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.CS144_PST = 'A6' AND B.CS143_FSD <= #GDATE# GROUP BY CS144_PJT, CS144_HNO ) B ON A.PJT = B.PJT AND A.HNO = B.HNO LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT CS172_PJO PJO, CS172_HNO HNO, MAX(CS172_MDT) MDT FROM SAPHEE.ZCST172 WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# GROUP BY CS172_PJO, CS172_HNO ) D ON A.PJT = D.PJO AND A.HNO = D.HNO INNER JOIN SAPHEE.ZCST111 E ON E.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.PJT = E.PJT AND A.HNO = E.HNO AND E.EXC = ''
WHERE (E.HST <> 'D' OR (E.HST = 'D' AND VALUE(D.PJO,'') > '')) AND (VALUE(A.USD,'') > #GDATE# OR VALUE(A.USD,'') = '') AND (VALUE(B.JHD,'') > #GDATE# OR VALUE(B.JHD,'') = '' OR A.BGT_B > VALUE(B.JHD,'')) AND (VALUE(D.MDT,'') > #GDATE# OR VALUE(D.MDT,'') = '') AND A.ARA > '' ) AS A
GROUP BY BSU
) AS B ON A.BSU = B.BSU AND A.YYYYMM = #YYYYMM# AND A.MANDT = #G_MANDT#
WHEN MATCHED THEN
UPDATE SET MIQ = B.MIQ ,MIQ_TGB = B.MIQ_TGB
